details.description: You can use this tool to search for bus registrations held on the Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA) website
details.more_information:
You can search for:

  • new, varied or cancelled bus registration applications accepted by the traffic commissioners - by traffic area or date
  • registrations published in ‘Notices and Proceedings’
  • all registrations currently held by operators

If you need help, contact the VOSA helpline.

VOSA helpline
0300 123 9000
details.introduction: You can use this tool to search for bus registrations using the Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA) database.

details.description: Includes setting up test stations, employing drivers and becoming a vehicle operator

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
